pages.text: After defeating the Lich, you come across a strangely opened hill in the midst of the Twilight Swamp. In the center, you find a hole leading into a structure composed of nearly unbreakable stone. Entering without a Maze Map would be ill-advised.

Descending into the dark, you are confronted by hosts of mobs among the confusion of twists and turns. Fight your way through heavy-hitting minotaurs and maze slimes, as well as swarms of beetles and other mobs, to find your way through the Labyrinth to defeat the mighty Minoshroom.$(br2)Eat the Meef Stroganoff to fortify yourself against the heat of the Fire Swamp and find the Hydra in its lair!
